revised_title: Crystallo-Optical Investigation of Nitrogen, Argon, Methane, and Organic Compounds
tldr: The authors conducted crystallo-optical investigations on nitrogen, argon, methane, and some organic compounds at low temperatures. They developed a quartz-glass crystallization vessel to study the crystal growth and properties of these substances. The study provided insights into the general crystallographic properties of these substances and their optical characters, helping to determine their crystal systems and symmetry.
